His clinic at hsr is well equipped , neat and very comfortable for patients looking for comfortable quality treatment . tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you Dr.Abhishek for a wonderful job on my teeth!
I was in extreme pain on left side of my face when I visited Dr.Abhishek at Bangalore Dental Specialists. He did a careful and complete analysis and explained all the issues very clearly. After the first part of the treatment, he gave me required medicines and explained the next steps and various options regarding the crown for teeth.
The clinic is very equipped with advanced equipments and the doctor does one sitting RCT as is feasible. The ambience of the clinic and the doctor and staffs approach is very amiable and respectful.
Thank you Dr.Abhishek for resolving issues with my teeth in such a professional and perfect way üëç

review:
Bangalore Dental Specialists has expert doctor Abhishek Somani who specialises in single sitting Root canal treatment which I've not hears of. He avoids calling for root canal multiple times. Also Dr Vinitha Specialises in Implants and shr did an amazing job on my mother's tooth.

For the first time it didn't seem like I visited a dentist.
